hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $37$ and move **left** $\purpleD{20}$ and then $\maroonD{8}$ more.

This number line shows $37 - 28$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 17, and 37. From 37 an arrow goes to 17 with the label minus 20 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 17 to question mark with the label minus 8 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b5fc5c5a0289794e12ce00685ab487ba3162891)
